item.title: Contact Us
item.description: We're excited to hear from you! Fill out a form and our team will contact you shortly. Interested in hiring our talent? Fill out this form and we'll get back to you shortly!

item.title: Design Philosophy
item.description: Consultation We start with focusing on the main goal for your site and outline the different ideas formed to meet your needs. Research/Audit If you already have a site, our team will deeply explore every component and present you with a detailed outline indicating accessibility issues and any others we find. Strategy We work with you to outline specific design preferences and branding to ensure the final product is exactly what you need.

item.title: Previous Works
item.description: The Athion Network A veteran team of developers focused on running creative custom servers in Minecraft. See More Nitric Concepts Creative design group focusing on custom skins in Minecraft and other xbox titles. See More OhMyForm Free & open source tool designed to simplify forms and analytics for developers See More Showerloop Innovative DIY shower that reduces 90% of water usage in a 10 minute shower.
